Question.Subject: wherecan download clips of house?
Question.Content: I need some clips of house for a school project, anyone know where i can get them to put them in a powerpoint. Full episodes or random clips, either will work.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Try hulu. They have clips. I am not sure if they tell download links. If they dont, then its not worth trying to get it from hulu.
If you dont use hulu, try youtube. Find a video, they go to keepvid.com and then you can download it.

Answer.Content:
www.fox.com/house
Good luck and I hope this helps.

Try hulu. They have clips. I am not sure if they tell download links. If they dont, then its not worth trying to get it from hulu.
If you dont use hulu, try youtube. Find a video, they go to keepvid.com and then you can download it.
